title: Z+F Splatterscope
paragraphs: The Z+F Splatterscope is a main weapon in Splatoon 3, introduced in Fresh Season 2023. It is a Z+F-branded variant of the Splatterscope, and a scoped variant of the Z+F Splat Charger. It was teased in the Fresh Season 2023 poster on 16 February 2023 and was officially revealed on Splatoon's Twitter accounts on 20 February 2023. It was released on 1 March 2023.
It is a rebranded successor of Firefin Splatterscope from Splatoon 2 following the merger between Firefin and Zekko to form Z+F.
- The Z+F Splatterscope shown in the Fresh Season 2023 promotional poster
